##############################################
###   French localization custom strings   ###
###       Scripted by Nicolas Fouqué       ###
##############################################

################################
###   Rulers // Dirigeants   ###
################################
# Ex: "So [he/she] tried" => "Aussi a-t-[il/elle] tenté de" (lower case / minuscule)
defined_text = {
	name = GetIlElleDir
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_il_FR
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_elle_FR
		trigger = {
			is_female = yes
		}
	}
}
# Ex: "[He/She] tried" => "[Il/Elle] a tenté de" (upper case / majuscule)
defined_text = {
	name = GetIlElleDirCap
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_il_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_elle_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			is_female = yes
		}
	}
}


# Ex: "[he/she] (the ruler's next spouse)" => "[il/elle] (= la future du dirigeant/le futur de la dirigeante)"
# Used to define a character the opposite gender of the ruler
defined_text = {
	name = GetAntiIlElleDir
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_elle_FR
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_il_FR
		trigger = {
			is_female = yes
		}
	}
}
# Ex: "[He/She] (= the ruler's next spouse)" => "[Il/Elle] (= la future du dirigeant/le futur de la dirigeante)"
# Used to define a character the opposite gender of the ruler
defined_text = {
	name = GetAntiIlElleDirCap
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_elle_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_il_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			is_female = yes
		}
	}
}


# Ex: "As for [him/her]" => "Quant à [lui/elle]" (lower case / minuscule)

	name = GetLuiElleDir

		localisation_key = string_lui_FR
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_elle_FR
		trigger = {
			is_female = yes
		}
	}
}

defined_text = {
	name = GetLuiElleDirCap
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_lui_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_elle_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			is_female = yes
		}
	}
}

		}
	}

			is_female = no
		}
	}

		trigger = {
			is_female = yes
		}
	}
}

	name = GetLeLaFDirCap
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_le_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_la_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			is_female = yes
		}
	}
}


# Ex: "[the] nearest consort of the Sultan" => "La consort [la] plus proche du sultan/Le consort [le] plus proche de la sultane"
# Used to define a character the opposite gender of the ruler
defined_text = {
	name = GetAntiLeLaFDir
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_la_FR
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_le_FR
		trigger = {
			is_female = yes
		}
	}
}
# Ex: "[The] nearest consort of the Sultan" => "[La] plus proche consort du sultan/[Le] plus proche consort de la sultane"
# Used to define a character the opposite gender of the ruler
defined_text = {
	name = GetAntiLeLaFDirCap
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_la_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_le_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			is_female = yes
		}
	}
}


### le/la/l' ###
# Ex: "[the] King/Queen" => "[le] roi / [la] reine"
defined_text = {
	name = GetLeLaLDir
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_le_FR
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_la_FR
		trigger = {
			is_female = yes
		}
	}
}
# Ex: "[The] King/Queen" => [Le] roi / [La] reine"
defined_text = {
	name = GetLeLaLDirCap
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_le_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_la_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			is_female = yes
		}
	}
}


# Ex: "[this] monarch" => "[ce/cette] monarque"

	name = GetCeCetteDir
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_ce_FR
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_cette_FR
		trigger = {
			is_female = yes
		}
	}
}
# Ex: "[This] monarch" => "[Ce/Cette] monarque"
defined_text = {
	name = GetCeCetteDirCap
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_ce_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_cette_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			is_female = yes
		}
	}
}



################################################################################################################
###   Mandatory use of some masculine forms in some contexts / Emploi forcé de certaines formes masculines   ###
################################################################################################################

# Ex: "[this] monarch" => "[ce/cette] monarque" (lower case/minuscule)
# Mandatory use of masculine form "ce" for some situations / Emploi forcé de la forme masculine "ce" dans certains contextes
defined_text = {
	name = GetCeCetteFDir
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_ce_FR
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_cette_FR
		trigger = {
			is_female = yes
		}
	}
}
# Ex: "[This] monarch" => "[Cet/Cette] monarque" (upper case/majuscule)
# Mandatory use of masculine form "Ce" for some situations / Emploi forcé de la forme masculine "Ce" dans certains contextes
defined_text = {
	name = GetCeCetteFDirCap
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_ce_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_cette_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			is_female = yes
		}
	}
}


# Ex: "[this] (wo)man" => "[cet/cette] homme/femme" (lower case/minuscule)
# Mandatory use of masculine form "cet" for some situations / Emploi forcé de la forme masculine "cet" dans certains contextes
defined_text = {
	name = GetCetCetteFDir
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_cet_FR
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_cette_FR
		trigger = {
			is_female = yes
		}
	}
}
# Ex: "[This] (wo)man" => "[Cet/Cette] homme/femme" (upper case/majuscule)
# Mandatory use of masculine form "Cet" for some situations / Emploi forcé de la forme masculine "Cet" dans certains contextes
defined_text = {
	name = GetCetCetteFDirCap
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_cet_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_cette_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			is_female = yes
		}
	}
}

	}

		}
	}

	}

# Ex: "great ruler" => "grand[ø/e] dirigeant[ø/e]"

	name = GetXEDir
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_XX_FR
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_e_FR
		trigger = {
			is_female = yes
		}
	}
}

# Ex: "The ruler married a great [lord/lady]" => "Le dirigeant a épousé un[e] grand[e] dame/La dirigeant a épousé un[ø] grand[ø] seigneur"
# Used to define a character the opposite gender of the ruler
defined_text = {
	name = GetAntiXEDir
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_e_FR
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_XX_FR
		trigger = {
			is_female = yes
		}
	}
}

# Ex: "The ruler will take a [spouse]" => "Le dirigeant va prendre une [épouse]/La dirigeante va prendre un [époux/épouse]"
# Defines a character the opposite gender of the ruler / Utilisé pour définir un personnage de sexe opposé à celui du dirigeant ou de la dirigeante
defined_text = {
	name = GetAntiEpouxEpouseDir
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_epouse_FR
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_epoux_FR
		trigger = {
			is_female = yes
		}
	}
}
# Ex: "The ruler will marry the [daughter/son] of a noble family" => "Le dirigeant va épouser la [fille] d'une grande famille/La dirigeante va épouser le [fils] d'une grande famille"
# Defines a character the opposite gender of the ruler / Utilisé pour définir un personnage de sexe opposé à celui du dirigeant ou de la dirigeante
 defined_text = {
	name = GetAntiFilsFilleDir
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_fille_FR
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_fils_FR
		trigger = {
			is_female = yes
		}
	}
}
# Ex: "The ruler marries his [brother/sister]" => "Le dirigeant épouse sa [soeur]/La dirigeante épouse son [frère]"
# Defines a character the opposite gender of the ruler / Utilisé pour définir un personnage de sexe opposé à celui du dirigeant ou de la dirigeante
defined_text = {
	name = GetAntiFrereSoeurDir
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_soeur_FR
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_frere_FR
		trigger = {
			is_female = yes
		}
	}
}

# Ex: "he/she is holy roman [emperor]/[empress]" => "il est l'[empereur] du SERG / elle est l'[impératrice] du SERG" (lower case / minuscule)
defined_text = {
	name = GetEmpereurImperatriceDir
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_empereur_FR
		trigger = {
			is_emperor = yes
			is_female = no
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_imperatrice_FR
		trigger = {
			is_emperor = yes
			is_female = yes
		}
	}
}
# Ex: "Holy Roman [emperor]/[empress] or not..." => "[Empereur]/[Impératrice] du SERG ou non..." (upper case / majuscule)
defined_text = {
	name = GetEmpereurImperatriceDirCap
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_empereur_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_imperatrice_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			is_female = yes
		}
	}
}


# Ex: "(S)he's [King] in Prussia" => "Il/Elle est [roi]/[reine] en Prusse" (lower case / minuscule)
defined_text = {
	name = GetRoiReineDir
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_roi_FR
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_reine_FR
		trigger = {
			is_female = yes
		}
	}
}
# Ex: "Being [King/Queen] IN Prussia is not being [King/Queen] OF Prussia" => "[Roi]/[Reine] EN Prusse n'est pas être roi/reine DE Prusse" (upper case / majuscule)
defined_text = {
	name = GetRoiReineDirCap
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_roi_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			is_female = no
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_reine_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			is_female = yes
		}
	}
}



##############################
###   Heirs // Héritiers   ###
##############################
# Ex: "So [he/she] tried" => "Aussi a-t-[il/elle] tenté de" (lower case / minuscule)
defined_text = {
	name = GetIlElleHrt
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_il_FR
		trigger = {
			has_female_heir = no
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_elle_FR
		trigger = {
			has_female_heir = yes
		}
	}
}
# Ex: "[He/She] tried" => "[Il/Elle] a tenté de" (upper case / majuscule)
defined_text = {
	name = GetIlElleHrtCap
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_il_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			has_female_heir = no
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_elle_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			has_female_heir = yes
		}
	}
}


# Ex: "[he/she] (= the heir's next spouse)" => "[il/elle] (= la future de l'héritier/le futur de l'héritière)"
# Used to define a character the opposite gender of the heir
defined_text = {
	name = GetAntiIlElleHrt
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_elle_FR
		trigger = {
			has_female_heir = no
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_il_FR
		trigger = {
			has_female_heir = yes
		}
	}
}

		}
	}

###   le/la/l'   ###

# Ex: "[the] heir" => "[le/la] héritier/ère"
defined_text = {
	name = GetLeLaLHrt
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_le_FR
		trigger = {
			has_female_heir = no
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_la_FR
		trigger = {
			has_female_heir = yes
		}
	}
	text = { # TEST
		localisation_key = string_l_FR
		trigger = { # ABETO "Abeto"
			government = monarchy
			religion_group = christian
			OR = {
				primary_culture = amhara
				primary_culture = sidamo
				primary_culture = tigray
			}
			has_female_heir = no
		}
	}
}
# Ex: "[The] heir" => "[Le/La] héritier/ère"

	name = GetLeLaLHrtCap
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_le_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			has_female_heir = no
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_la_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			has_female_heir = yes
		}
	}
}

		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_elle_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			has_female_consort = yes
		}
	}
}

###   le/la/l'   ###

# Ex: "[the] consort" => "[le/la] consort"
defined_text = {
	name = GetLeLaLCons
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_le_FR
		trigger = {
			has_female_consort = no
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_la_FR
		trigger = {
			has_female_consort = yes
		}
	}
	text = { # TEST
		localisation_key = string_l_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					tag = HAB
					government = monarchy
					government_rank = 1
					NOT = { government_rank = 2 }
					has_female_consort = no
				}
				AND = {
					tag = HAB
					government = monarchy
					government_rank = 1
					NOT = { government_rank = 2 }
					has_female_consort = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
# Ex: "[The] consort" => "[Le/La] consort"
defined_text = {
	name = GetLeLaLConsCap
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_le_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			has_female_consort = no
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_la_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			has_female_consort = yes
		}
	}
}

#################################################################
###   Administrative Advisors // Conseillers administratifs   ###
#################################################################
# Ex: "So [he/she] tried" => "Aussi a-t-[il/elle] tenté de" (lower case / minuscule)
defined_text = {
	name = GetIlElleAdm
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_il_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				employed_advisor = { type = philosopher is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = natural_scientist is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = artist is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = treasurer is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = theologian is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = master_of_mint is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = inquisitor is_male = yes }
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_elle_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				employed_advisor = { type = philosopher is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = natural_scientist is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = artist is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = treasurer is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = theologian is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = master_of_mint is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = inquisitor is_female = yes }
			}
		}
	}
}
# Ex: "[He/She] tried" => "[Il/Elle] a tenté de" (upper case / majuscule)
defined_text = {
	name = GetIlElleAdmCap
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_il_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				employed_advisor = { type = philosopher is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = natural_scientist is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = artist is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = treasurer is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = theologian is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = master_of_mint is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = inquisitor is_male = yes }
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_elle_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				employed_advisor = { type = philosopher is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = natural_scientist is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = artist is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = treasurer is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = theologian is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = master_of_mint is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = inquisitor is_female = yes }
			}
		}
	}
}

				employed_advisor = { type = treasurer is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = theologian is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = master_of_mint is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = inquisitor is_male = yes }
			}
		}
	}

		trigger = {
			OR = {
				employed_advisor = { type = philosopher is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = natural_scientist is_female = yes }

				employed_advisor = { type = theologian is_female = yes }

				employed_advisor = { type = inquisitor is_female = yes }
			}
		}
	}
}

				employed_advisor = { type = philosopher is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = natural_scientist is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = artist is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = treasurer is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = theologian is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = master_of_mint is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = inquisitor is_male = yes }
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_quelle_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				employed_advisor = { type = philosopher is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = natural_scientist is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = artist is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = treasurer is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = theologian is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = master_of_mint is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = inquisitor is_female = yes }
			}
		}
	}
}

# Ex: "[the] treasurer" => "[le/la] financier/ère"
defined_text = {
	name = GetLeLaLAdm
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_le_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				employed_advisor = { type = philosopher is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = natural_scientist is_male = yes }
				#employed_advisor = { type = artist is_male = yes } # separated to allow the use of l' / séparé pour utiliser l'
				employed_advisor = { type = treasurer is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = theologian is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = master_of_mint is_male = yes }
				#employed_advisor = { type = inquisitor is_male = yes } # separated to allow the use of l' / séparé pour utiliser l'
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_la_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				employed_advisor = { type = philosopher is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = natural_scientist is_female = yes }
				#employed_advisor = { type = artist is_female = yes } # separated to allow the use of l' / séparé pour utiliser l'
				employed_advisor = { type = treasurer is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = theologian is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = master_of_mint is_female = yes }
				#employed_advisor = { type = inquisitor is_female = yes } # separated to allow the use of l' / séparé pour utiliser l'
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_l_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				employed_advisor = { type = artist is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = artist is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = inquisitor is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = inquisitor is_female = yes }
			}
		}
	}

# Ex: "[his] adviser" => "s[on] conseiller/s[a] conseillère"
defined_text = {
	name = GetOnAAdm
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_on_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				employed_advisor = { type = philosopher is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = natural_scientist is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = artist is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = artist is_female = yes } # separated to allow the use of "(s)on" / séparé pour utiliser "(s)on"
				employed_advisor = { type = treasurer is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = theologian is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = master_of_mint is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = inquisitor is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = inquisitor is_female = yes } # separated to allow the use of "(s)on" / séparé pour utiliser "(s)on"
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_a_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				employed_advisor = { type = philosopher is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = natural_scientist is_female = yes }
				#employed_advisor = { type = artist is_female = yes } # separated to allow the use of "son" / séparé pour utiliser "son"
				employed_advisor = { type = treasurer is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = theologian is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = master_of_mint is_female = yes }
				#employed_advisor = { type = inquisitor is_female = yes } # separated to allow the use of "son" / séparé pour utiliser "son"
			}
		}
	}
}

# Ex: "[of the] advisor" => "[du] conseiller/[de la] conseillère"
defined_text = {
	name = GetDuDelaAdm
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_du_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				employed_advisor = { type = philosopher is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = natural_scientist is_male = yes }
				#employed_advisor = { type = artist is_male = yes } # separated to allow the use of "de l'" / séparé pour utiliser "de l'"
				employed_advisor = { type = treasurer is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = theologian is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = master_of_mint is_male = yes }
				#employed_advisor = { type = inquisitor is_male = yes } # separated to allow the use of "de l'" / séparé pour utiliser "de l'"
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_dela_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				employed_advisor = { type = philosopher is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = natural_scientist is_female = yes }
				#employed_advisor = { type = artist is_female = yes } # separated to allow the use of "de l'" / séparé pour utiliser "de l'"
				employed_advisor = { type = treasurer is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = theologian is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = master_of_mint is_female = yes }
				#employed_advisor = { type = inquisitor is_female = yes } # separated to allow the use of "de l'" / séparé pour utiliser "de l'"
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_del_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				employed_advisor = { type = artist is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = artist is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = inquisitor is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = inquisitor is_female = yes }
			}
		}
	}
}

				employed_advisor = { type = philosopher is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = natural_scientist is_male = yes }
				#employed_advisor = { type = artist is_male = yes } # separated to allow the use of "à l'" / séparé pour utiliser "à l'"
				employed_advisor = { type = treasurer is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = theologian is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = master_of_mint is_male = yes }
				#employed_advisor = { type = inquisitor is_male = yes } # separated to allow the use of "à l'" / séparé pour utiliser "à l'"
			}
		}
	}

		trigger = {
			OR = {
				employed_advisor = { type = philosopher is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = natural_scientist is_female = yes }
				#employed_advisor = { type = artist is_female = yes } # separated to allow the use of "à l'" / séparé pour utiliser "à l'"
				employed_advisor = { type = treasurer is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = theologian is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = master_of_mint is_female = yes }
				#employed_advisor = { type = inquisitor is_female = yes } # separated to allow the use of "à l'" / séparé pour utiliser "à l'"
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_al_FR
		trigger = {

# Ex: "[Treasurer]" => "[financer/financière]" (lower case)
defined_text = {
	name = GetAdm
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_philosopher_FR
		trigger = {
			advisor = philosopher
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_natural_scientist_FR
		trigger = {
			advisor = natural_scientist
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_artist_FR
		trigger = {
			advisor = artist
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_treasurer_male_FR
		trigger = {
			employed_advisor = { type = treasurer is_male = yes }
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_treasurer_fem_FR
		trigger = {
			employed_advisor = { type = treasurer is_female = yes }
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_theologian_male_FR
		trigger = {
			employed_advisor = { type = theologian is_male = yes }
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_theologian_fem_FR
		trigger = {
			employed_advisor = { type = theologian is_female = yes }
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_master_of_mint_male_FR
		trigger = {
			employed_advisor = { type = master_of_mint is_male = yes }
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_master_of_mint_fem_FR
		trigger = {
			employed_advisor = { type = master_of_mint is_female = yes }
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_inquisitor_male_FR
		trigger = {
			employed_advisor = { type = inquisitor is_male = yes }
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_inquisitor_fem_FR
		trigger = {
			employed_advisor = { type = inquisitor is_female = yes }
		}
	}
}

				employed_advisor = { type = artist is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = treasurer is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = theologian is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = master_of_mint is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = inquisitor is_female = yes }
			}
		}
	}
}


############################################################
###   Diplomatic Advisors // Conseillers diplomatiques   ###
############################################################
# Ex: "So [he/she] tried" => "Aussi a-t-[il/elle] tenté de" (lower case / minuscule)
defined_text = {
	name = GetIlElleDip
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_il_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				employed_advisor = { type = statesman is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = naval_reformer is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = trader is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = spymaster is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = colonial_governor is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = diplomat is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = navigator is_male = yes }
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_elle_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				employed_advisor = { type = statesman is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = naval_reformer is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = trader is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = spymaster is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = colonial_governor is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = diplomat is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = navigator is_female = yes }
			}
		}
	}
}

				employed_advisor = { type = colonial_governor is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = diplomat is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = navigator is_male = yes }
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_a_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				employed_advisor = { type = statesman is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = naval_reformer is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = trader is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = spymaster is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = colonial_governor is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = diplomat is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = navigator is_female = yes }
			}

			OR = {
				#employed_advisor = { type = statesman is_male = yes } # separated to allow the use of "de l'" / séparé pour utiliser "de l'"

				employed_advisor = { type = trader is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = spymaster is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = colonial_governor is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = diplomat is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = navigator is_male = yes }
			}
		}
	}

		}

			employed_advisor = { type = colonial_governor is_female = yes }
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_diplomat_male_FR
		trigger = {
			employed_advisor = { type = diplomat is_male = yes }
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_diplomat_fem_FR
		trigger = {
			employed_advisor = { type = diplomat is_female = yes }
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_navigator_male_FR
		trigger = {
			employed_advisor = { type = navigator is_male = yes }
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_navigator_fem_FR
		trigger = {
			employed_advisor = { type = navigator is_female = yes }
		}
	}
}


# Ex: "[from him/her]" => "[de lui/d'elle]" (lower case / minuscule)

	name = GetDeluiDelleDip
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_delui_FR

			OR = {
				employed_advisor = { type = statesman is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = naval_reformer is_male = yes }

				employed_advisor = { type = spymaster is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = colonial_governor is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = diplomat is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = navigator is_male = yes }

		}

# Ex: "So [he/she] tried" => "Aussi a-t-[il/elle] tenté de" (lower case / minuscule)
defined_text = {
	name = GetIlElleMil
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_il_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				employed_advisor = { type = army_reformer is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = army_organiser is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = commandant is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = quartermaster is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = recruitmaster is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = fortification_expert is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = grand_captain is_male = yes }
			}
		}
	}

			OR = {
				employed_advisor = { type = army_reformer is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = army_organiser is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = commandant is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = quartermaster is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = recruitmaster is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = fortification_expert is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = grand_captain is_female = yes }
			}
		}
	}
}

	name = GetLeLaLMil
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_le_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				employed_advisor = { type = army_reformer is_male = yes }
				#employed_advisor = { type = army_organiser is_male = yes } # separated to allow the use of l' / séparé pour utiliser l'
				employed_advisor = { type = commandant is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = quartermaster is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = recruitmaster is_male = yes }
				#employed_advisor = { type = fortification_expert is_male = yes } # separated to allow the use of l' / séparé pour utiliser l'
				employed_advisor = { type = grand_captain is_male = yes }
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_la_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				employed_advisor = { type = army_reformer is_female = yes }
				#employed_advisor = { type = army_organiser is_female = yes } # separated to allow the use of l' / séparé pour utiliser l'
				employed_advisor = { type = commandant is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = quartermaster is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = recruitmaster is_female = yes }
				#employed_advisor = { type = fortification_expert is_female = yes } # separated to allow the use of l' / séparé pour utiliser l'
				employed_advisor = { type = grand_captain is_female = yes }
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_l_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {

				employed_advisor = { type = army_organiser is_female = yes }

# Ex: "[this] advisor" => "[ce/cette] conseiller" (lower case/minuscule)
# Mandatory use of masculine form "ce" for some situations / Emploi forcé de la forme masculine "ce" dans certains contextes
defined_text = {
	name = GetCeCetteFMil
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_ce_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				employed_advisor = { type = army_reformer is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = army_organiser is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = commandant is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = quartermaster is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = recruitmaster is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = fortification_expert is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = grand_captain is_male = yes }
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_cette_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				employed_advisor = { type = army_reformer is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = army_organiser is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = commandant is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = quartermaster is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = recruitmaster is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = fortification_expert is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = grand_captain is_female = yes }
			}
		}
	}
}
# Ex: "[This] sick person" => "[Cet/Cette] consort" (upper case/majuscule)

	name = GetCeCetteFMilCap
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_ce_cap_FR

				employed_advisor = { type = commandant is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = quartermaster is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = recruitmaster is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = fortification_expert is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = grand_captain is_female = yes }
			}
		}
	}
}


# Ex: "[this] (wo)man" => "[cet/cette] homme/femme" (lower case/minuscule)
# Mandatory use of masculine form "cet" for some situations / Emploi forcé de la forme masculine "cet" dans certains contextes
defined_text = {
	name = GetCetCetteFMil
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_cet_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				employed_advisor = { type = army_reformer is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = army_organiser is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = commandant is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = quartermaster is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = recruitmaster is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = fortification_expert is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = grand_captain is_male = yes }
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_cette_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				employed_advisor = { type = army_reformer is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = army_organiser is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = commandant is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = quartermaster is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = recruitmaster is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = fortification_expert is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = grand_captain is_female = yes }
			}
		}
	}
}

# Ex: "[his] advisor" => "s[on] conseiller/s[a] conseillère"
defined_text = {
	name = GetOnAMil
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_on_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				employed_advisor = { type = army_reformer is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = army_organiser is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = army_organiser is_female = yes } # separated to allow the use of "(s)on" / séparé pour utiliser "(s)on"
				employed_advisor = { type = commandant is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = quartermaster is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = recruitmaster is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = fortification_expert is_male = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = fortification_expert is_female = yes } # separated to allow the use of "(s)on" / séparé pour utiliser "(s)on"
				employed_advisor = { type = grand_captain is_male = yes }
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_a_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				employed_advisor = { type = army_reformer is_female = yes }
				#employed_advisor = { type = army_organiser is_female = yes } # separated to allow the use of "(s)on" / séparé pour utiliser "(s)on"
				employed_advisor = { type = commandant is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = quartermaster is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = recruitmaster is_female = yes }
				#employed_advisor = { type = fortification_expert is_female = yes } # separated to allow the use of "(s)on" / séparé pour utiliser "(s)on"
				employed_advisor = { type = grand_captain is_female = yes }
			}
		}
	}
}

				employed_advisor = { type = recruitmaster is_male = yes }

		trigger = {
			OR = {
				employed_advisor = { type = army_reformer is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = army_organiser is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = commandant is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = quartermaster is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = recruitmaster is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = fortification_expert is_female = yes }
				employed_advisor = { type = grand_captain is_female = yes }
			}
		}
	}
}

		}
	}

#####################################################################################
###   New Court Flavour Advisors // Conseillers des nouveaux événements de cour   ###
#####################################################################################

#GetTitle of the correct advisor
defined_text = {
	name = GetEventAdvisorTitleMinus
	random = no
	
	text = {
		localisation_key = EventAdvisorTitleMinus.A
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = advisor_events_adm
		}
	}
	
	text = {
		localisation_key = EventAdvisorTitleMinus.D
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = advisor_events_dip
		}
	}
	
	text = {
		localisation_key = EventAdvisorTitleMinus.M
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = advisor_events_mil
		}
	}
}

### Ex: "[Christianity]" => "[christianisme]"
defined_text = {
	name = GetFamRelN
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_christian_n_FR
		trigger = { religion_group = christian }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_muslim_n_FR
		trigger = { religion_group = muslim }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_eastern_n_FR
		trigger = { religion_group = eastern }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_dharmic_n_FR
		trigger = { religion_group = dharmic }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_pagan_n_FR
		trigger = { religion_group = pagan }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_jewish_group_n_FR
		trigger = { religion_group = jewish_group }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_zoroastrian_group_n_FR
		trigger = { religion_group = zoroastrian_group }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = gnostic_rel
		trigger = { religion_group = gnostic }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = yazidi_rel
		trigger = { religion_group = yazidi }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = american_pagan_rel
		trigger = { religion_group = american_pagan }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = north_europe_pagan_rel
		trigger = { religion_group = north_europe_pagan }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = central_europe_pagan_rel
		trigger = { religion_group = central_europe_pagan }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = steppe_pagan_rel
		trigger = { religion_group = steppe_pagan }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = asian_pagan_rel
		trigger = { religion_group = asian_pagan }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = south_europe_pagan_rel
		trigger = { religion_group = south_europe_pagan }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = african_pagan_rel
		trigger = { religion_group = african_pagan }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = mena_pagan_rel
		trigger = { religion_group = mena_pagan }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = celtic_pagan_rel
		trigger = { religion_group = celtic_pagan }
	}
}


### Ex: "A [Muslim] believer" => "Un croyant [musulman]" (singular masculine/masculin singulier)
defined_text = {
	name = GetFamRelMS
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_christian_ms_FR
		trigger = { religion_group = christian }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_muslim_ms_FR
		trigger = { OR = { religion_group = muslim religion_group = muslirel } } # La Pléiade
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_eastern_ms_FR
		trigger = { OR = { religion_group = eastern religion_group = easterrel } } # La Pléiade
	}
	text = {

### Ex: "This is Christianity" => "Voilà ce qu'est [le] christianisme / [l']islam" (lower case / minuscule)
defined_text = {
	name = GetLeLaFamRel
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_le_FR
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				religion_group = muslim
				religion_group = eastern
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_l_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				religion_group = muslim
				religion_group = eastern
			}
		}
	}
}
### Ex: "Christianity is..." => "Le [christianisme] / [L']islam est..." (upper case / majuscule)
defined_text = {
	name = GetLeLaFamRelCap
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_le_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				religion_group = muslim
				religion_group = eastern
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_l_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				religion_group = muslim
				religion_group = eastern
			}
		}
	}
}


### Ex: "A precept [of] Christianity" => "Un précepte [du] christianisme" (lower case / minuscule)
defined_text = {
	name = GetDuDelaFamRel
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_du_FR
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				religion_group = muslim
				religion_group = eastern
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_del_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				religion_group = muslim
				religion_group = eastern
			}
		}
	}
}
### Ex: "[Of] Christianity is born" => "[Du] christianisme / [De l']islam est né" (= upper case / majuscule)
defined_text = {
	name = GetDuDelaFamRelCap
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_du_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				religion_group = muslim
				religion_group = eastern
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_del_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				religion_group = muslim
				religion_group = eastern
			}
		}
	}
}

	name = GetAuAlaFamRel
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_au_FR

			NOT = {
				religion_group = muslim

			}
		}
	}

			}
		}
	}

defined_text = {
	name = GetAuAlaFamRelCap
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_au_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			NOT = {
				religion_group = muslim
				religion_group = eastern
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_al_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				religion_group = muslim
				religion_group = eastern
			}
		}
	}
}

### Ex: "Sunnism/Reform/Hinduism is..." => "[le] sunnisme/[la] Réforme/[l']iconoclasme est..." (lower case / minuscule)
defined_text = {
	name = GetLeLaRel
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_le_FR
		trigger = {
			frloc_religion_masc_cons = yes
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_la_FR
		trigger = {
			frloc_religion_fem_cons = yes
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_l_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				frloc_religion_masc_vow = yes
				frloc_religion_fem_vow = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
### Ex: "Sunnism/Reform/Hinduism is..." => "[Le] sunnisme/[La] Réforme/[L']iconoclasme est..." (upper case / majuscule)
defined_text = {
	name = GetLeLaRelCap
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_le_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			frloc_religion_masc_cons = yes
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_la_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			frloc_religion_fem_cons = yes
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_l_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				frloc_religion_masc_vow = yes
				frloc_religion_fem_vow = yes
			}
		}
	}
}


### Ex: "Priests propagate [it] (= sunnism/orthodoxy)" => "Le clergé [le] diffuse (= le sunnisme)/[la] diffuse (= l'orthoxie)" (lower case / minuscule)
defined_text = {
	name = GetLeLaFRel
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_le_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				frloc_religion_masc_cons = yes
				frloc_religion_masc_vow = yes
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_la_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				frloc_religion_fem_cons = yes
				frloc_religion_fem_vow = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
### Ex: "Propagate [it] is important. (= sunnism/orthodoxy)" => "[Le]/[La] diffuser est important. (= sunnisme/orthoxie)" (upper case / majuscule)
defined_text = {
	name = GetLeLaFRelCap
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_le_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				frloc_religion_masc_cons = yes
				frloc_religion_masc_vow = yes
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_la_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				frloc_religion_fem_cons = yes
				frloc_religion_fem_vow = yes
			}
		}
	}
}


### Ex: "A precept [of] Sunnism/Reform/Hinduism " => "un précepte [du] sunnisme/[de la] Réforme/[de l']iconoclasme" (lower case / minuscule)
defined_text = {
	name = GetDuDelaRel
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_du_FR
		trigger = {
			frloc_religion_masc_cons = yes
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_dela_FR
		trigger = {
			frloc_religion_fem_cons = yes
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_del_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				frloc_religion_masc_vow = yes
				frloc_religion_fem_vow = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
### Ex: "[Of] Sunnism/Reform/Hinduism is born" => "[Du] sunnisme/[De la] Réforme/[De l']iconoclasme est né..." (= upper case / majuscule)
defined_text = {
	name = GetDuDelaRelCap
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_du_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			frloc_religion_masc_cons = yes
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_dela_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			frloc_religion_fem_cons = yes
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_del_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				frloc_religion_masc_vow = yes
				frloc_religion_fem_vow = yes
			}
		}
	}
}


### Ex: "[to] Sunnism/Reform/Hinduism " => "[au] sunnisme/[à la] Réforme/[à l']iconoclasme"
defined_text = {
	name = GetAuAlaRel
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_au_FR
		trigger = {
			frloc_religion_masc_cons = yes
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_ala_FR
		trigger = {
			frloc_religion_fem_cons = yes
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_al_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				frloc_religion_masc_vow = yes
				frloc_religion_fem_vow = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
### Ex: "[To] Sunnism/Reform/Hinduism belongs" => "[Au] sunnisme/[À la] Réforme/[À l']iconoclasme appartient..." (= upper case / majuscule)
defined_text = {
	name = GetAuAlaRelCap
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_au_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			frloc_religion_masc_cons = yes
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_ala_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			frloc_religion_fem_cons = yes
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_al_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				frloc_religion_masc_vow = yes
				frloc_religion_fem_vow = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

### Ex: "[the] Sunnism/Reform/Hinduism " => "[le] sunnisme/[la] Réforme/[l']iconoclasme"
defined_text = {
	name = GetLeLaRelSec
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_le_FR
		trigger = {
			frloc_secondary_religion_masc_cons = yes
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_la_FR
		trigger = {
			frloc_secondary_religion_fem_cons = yes
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_l_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				frloc_secondary_religion_masc_vow = yes
				frloc_secondary_religion_fem_vow = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
### Ex: "[The] Sunnism/Reform/Hinduism " => "[Le] sunnisme/[La] Réforme/[L']iconoclasme"
defined_text = {
	name = GetLeLaRelSecCap
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_le_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			frloc_secondary_religion_masc_cons = yes
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_la_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			frloc_secondary_religion_fem_cons = yes
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_l_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				frloc_secondary_religion_masc_vow = yes
				frloc_secondary_religion_fem_vow = yes
			}
		}
	}
}


### Ex: "propagate [it] (sunnism/orthodoxy)" => "[le] diffuser (sunnisme)/[la] diffuser (orthodoxie)"
defined_text = {
	name = GetLeLaFRelSec
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_le_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				frloc_secondary_religion_masc_cons = yes
				frloc_secondary_religion_masc_vow = yes
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_la_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				frloc_secondary_religion_fem_cons = yes
				frloc_secondary_religion_fem_vow = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
### Ex: "Propagate [it] (sunnism/orthodoxy)" => "[Le] diffuser (sunnisme)/[La] diffuser (orthodoxie)"
defined_text = {
	name = GetLeLaFRelSecCap
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_le_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				frloc_secondary_religion_masc_cons = yes
				frloc_secondary_religion_masc_vow = yes
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_la_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				frloc_secondary_religion_fem_cons = yes
				frloc_secondary_religion_fem_vow = yes
			}
		}
	}
}


### Ex: "a precept [of] Sunnism/Reform/Hinduism" => "un précepte [du] sunnisme/[de la] Réforme/[de l']iconoclasme" (lower case / minuscule)
defined_text = {
	name = GetDuDelaRelSec
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_du_FR
		trigger = {
			frloc_secondary_religion_masc_cons = yes
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_dela_FR
		trigger = {
			frloc_secondary_religion_fem_cons = yes
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_del_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				frloc_secondary_religion_masc_vow = yes
				frloc_secondary_religion_fem_vow = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
### Ex: "[Of the] Sunnism/Reform/Hinduism " => "[Du] sunnisme/[De la] Réforme/[De l']iconoclasme"
defined_text = {
	name = GetDuDelaRelSecCap
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_du_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			frloc_secondary_religion_masc_cons = yes
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_dela_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			frloc_secondary_religion_fem_cons = yes
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_del_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				frloc_secondary_religion_masc_vow = yes
				frloc_secondary_religion_fem_vow = yes
			}
		}
	}
}


### Ex: "[to] Sunnism/Reform/Hinduism " => "[au] sunnisme/[à la] Réforme/[à l']iconoclasme"
defined_text = {
	name = GetAuAlaRelSec
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_au_FR
		trigger = {
			frloc_secondary_religion_masc_cons = yes
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_ala_FR
		trigger = {
			frloc_secondary_religion_fem_cons = yes
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_al_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				frloc_secondary_religion_masc_vow = yes
				frloc_secondary_religion_fem_vow = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
### Ex: "[To] Sunnism/Reform/Hinduism " => "[Au] sunnisme/[À la] Réforme/[À l']iconoclasme"
defined_text = {
	name = GetAuAlaRelSecCap
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_au_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			frloc_secondary_religion_masc_cons = yes
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_ala_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			frloc_secondary_religion_fem_cons = yes
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_al_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				frloc_secondary_religion_masc_vow = yes
				frloc_secondary_religion_fem_vow = yes
			}
		}
	}
}



##############################################################################
###   Culture Group Adjectives // Adjectifs pour les sphères culturelles   ###
##############################################################################

### Ex: "(Tuscan) is a [Latin] language" => "Le (toscan) est un parler [latin]" (singular masculine / masculin singulier)
defined_text = {
	name = GetSphCultMS
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_germanic_ms_FR

###   Culture Adjectives // Adjectifs pour les cultures   ###

### Ex: "A [Turkish] governor" => "un gouverneur [turc]" (singular masculine / masculin singulier)

### Ex: "[Turkish] women are beautiful" => "les femmes [turques] sont jolies" (plural feminine / féminin pluriel)						
defined_text = {						
	name = GetCultFP
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_pommeranian_fp_FR
		trigger = { OR = { primary_culture = pommeranian culture = pommeranian } }

###########################################################
###   Government names // Noms des régimes politiques   ###

#### Ex: "[the] Kingdom/Empire" => "[le] royaume/[l']empire"

#	name = GetLeLaRP
#	text = {
#		localisation_key = string_l_FR
#		trigger = {
#			tag = HAB
#			government = monarchy
#		}
#	}

#####################################################
###   Nation Articles // Articles pour les pays   ###
#####################################################

### Ex: "Portugal/France/Austria/Hamburg/Aztecs" => "[le] Portugal/[la] France/[l']Autriche/[Ø] Hambourg/[les] Aztèques" (lower case / minuscule)
defined_text = {
	name = GetLeLaNP
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_le_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				frloc_tags_art_sg_masc_cons_au_01a = yes
				frloc_tags_art_sg_masc_cons_dansle_01b = yes
				frloc_tags_art_sg_masc_cons_en_01c = yes
				# fallback for Colonial/RNW/Dynamic nations
				is_dynamic_tag = yes
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_la_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				frloc_tags_art_sg_fem_cons_de_en_03a = yes
				frloc_tags_art_sg_fem_cons_dela_auseindela_03b = yes
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_l_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				frloc_tags_art_sg_masc_vow_en_02a = yes
				frloc_tags_art_sg_masc_vow_dansl_02b = yes
				frloc_tags_art_sg_fem_vow_d_en_04a = yes
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_X_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				frloc_tags_noart_sg_masc_cons_en_a_09a = yes
				frloc_tags_noart_sg_masc_cons_a_a_09b = yes
				frloc_tags_noart_sg_masc_cons_en_aux_09c = yes
				frloc_tags_noart_sg_masc_vow_en_a_10a = yes
				frloc_tags_noart_sg_masc_vow_a_a_10b = yes
				frloc_tags_noart_sg_fem_cons_de_en_11a = yes
				frloc_tags_noart_sg_fem_cons_de_a_11b = yes
				frloc_tags_noart_sg_fem_cons_dela_en_11c = yes
				frloc_tags_noart_sg_fem_vow_d_en_12a = yes
				frloc_tags_noart_sg_fem_vow_d_a_12b = yes
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_les_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				frloc_tags_art_pl_masc_cons_chezles_05a = yes
				frloc_tags_art_pl_masc_cons_aux_05b = yes
				frloc_tags_art_pl_masc_cons_dansles_05c = yes
				frloc_tags_art_pl_fem_cons_aux_07a = yes
				frloc_tags_art_pl_fem_cons_dansles_07b = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
### Ex: "Portugal/France/Austria/Hamburg/Aztecs" => "[Le] Portugal/[La] France/[L']Autriche/[Ø] Hambourg/[Les] Aztèques" (upper case / majuscule)

	name = GetLeLaNPCap

			OR = {
				frloc_tags_art_sg_masc_cons_au_01a = yes

### Ex: "[our] ennemies" => "no[tre] ennemi (le Danemark)/no[tre] ennemie (la Suède)/no[s] ennemis (les USA)/no[s] ennemies (les Provinces-Unies)"
defined_text = {
	name = GetTreSNP
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_tre_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				frloc_tags_art_sg_masc_cons_au_01a = yes
				frloc_tags_art_sg_masc_cons_dansle_01b = yes
				frloc_tags_art_sg_masc_cons_en_01c = yes
				frloc_tags_art_sg_masc_vow_en_02a = yes
				frloc_tags_art_sg_masc_vow_dansl_02b = yes
				frloc_tags_art_sg_fem_cons_de_en_03a = yes
				frloc_tags_art_sg_fem_cons_dela_auseindela_03b = yes
				frloc_tags_art_sg_fem_vow_d_en_04a = yes
				frloc_tags_noart_sg_masc_cons_en_a_09a = yes
				frloc_tags_noart_sg_masc_cons_a_a_09b = yes

				frloc_tags_noart_sg_fem_cons_de_a_11b = yes
				frloc_tags_noart_sg_fem_cons_dela_en_11c = yes
				frloc_tags_noart_sg_fem_vow_d_en_12a = yes
				frloc_tags_noart_sg_fem_vow_d_a_12b = yes
				# fallback for Colonial/RNW/Dynamic nations
				is_dynamic_tag = yes
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_s_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {

				frloc_tags_noart_sg_fem_vow_d_en_12a = yes
				frloc_tags_noart_sg_fem_vow_d_a_12b = yes
				# fallback for Colonial/RNW/Dynamic nations
				is_dynamic_tag = yes
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_sont_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {

### Ex: "[His]/[Hers]/[Theirs] or not, ... (= France/USA)" => "[Siens/Leurs] ou pas, ... (= à la France/aux USA)" (upper case / minuscule)

#################################################################################
###   Colonial Nations ("New X") // Nations coloniales (Nouveau/Nouvelle-X)   ###
#################################################################################

### Ex: "[New] Denmark/France/Ulster/Cleves/United Provinces/Aztecs" => "[Nouveau]-Danemark/[Nouvelle]-Suède/[Nouvel]-Ulster/[Nouvelle]-Clèves/[Nouvelles]-Provinces-Unies/[Nouveaux]-Hospitaliers"
### Used "only by key / Utilisé uniquement par la clef COLONIAL_REGION_New_Root_GetName (New X // Nouveau/Nouvelle...-X)
defined_text = {
	name = GetNouveauNouvelleNP
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_nouveau_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				frloc_tags_art_sg_masc_cons_au_01a = yes
				frloc_tags_art_sg_masc_cons_dansle_01b = yes
				frloc_tags_art_sg_masc_cons_en_01c = yes
				frloc_tags_noart_sg_masc_cons_en_a_09a = yes
				frloc_tags_noart_sg_masc_cons_a_a_09b = yes
				frloc_tags_noart_sg_masc_cons_en_aux_09c = yes
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_nouvelle_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				frloc_tags_art_sg_fem_cons_de_en_03a = yes
				frloc_tags_art_sg_fem_cons_dela_auseindela_03b = yes
				frloc_tags_art_sg_fem_vow_d_en_04a = yes
				frloc_tags_noart_sg_fem_cons_de_en_11a = yes
				frloc_tags_noart_sg_fem_cons_de_a_11b = yes
				frloc_tags_noart_sg_fem_cons_dela_en_11c = yes
				frloc_tags_noart_sg_fem_vow_d_en_12a = yes
				frloc_tags_noart_sg_fem_vow_d_a_12b = yes
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_nouvel_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				frloc_tags_art_sg_masc_vow_en_02a = yes
				frloc_tags_art_sg_masc_vow_dansl_02b = yes
				frloc_tags_noart_sg_masc_vow_en_a_10a = yes
				frloc_tags_noart_sg_masc_vow_a_a_10b = yes
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_nouveaux_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				frloc_tags_art_pl_masc_cons_chezles_05a = yes
				frloc_tags_art_pl_masc_cons_aux_05b = yes
				frloc_tags_art_pl_masc_cons_dansles_05c = yes
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_nouvelles_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				frloc_tags_art_pl_fem_cons_aux_07a = yes
				frloc_tags_art_pl_fem_cons_dansles_07b = yes
			}
		}
	}
}



#########################################################
###   Country Adjectives // Adjectifs pour les pays   ###
#########################################################

### Ex: "[Austrian]" => "[autrichien]" (singular masculine/masculin singulier)

	name = GetRootAdjMS
	random = no

		localisation_key = string_CHINA_STRING_ADJ_m_FR
		trigger = { OR = { has_country_flag = is_china_flag has_country_flag = is_revolutionary_china_flag } }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_GURKANI_EMPIRE_STRING_ADJ_s_FR

	name = GetRootAdjFS
	random = no
	### HIGHER PRIORITY ###

		localisation_key = string_CHINA_STRING_ADJ_fs_FR
		trigger = { OR = { has_country_flag = is_china_flag has_country_flag = is_revolutionary_china_flag } }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_GURKANI_EMPIRE_STRING_ADJ_s_FR

	}

	name = GetRootAdjMP
	random = no
	### HIGHER PRIORITY ###
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_CHINA_STRING_ADJ_m_FR
		trigger = { OR = { has_country_flag = is_china_flag has_country_flag = is_revolutionary_china_flag } }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_GURKANI_EMPIRE_STRING_ADJ_p_FR
		trigger = { OR = { has_country_flag = is_gurkani_flag has_country_flag = is_revolutionary_gurkani_flag } }
	}

		trigger = { is_dynamic_tag = yes }

}

### Ex: "[Austrian]" => "[autrichien]" (singular masculine/masculin singulier)
defined_text = {
	name = GetFromAdjMS
	random = no
	### HIGHER PRIORITY ###
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_CHINA_STRING_ADJ_m_FR
		trigger = { OR = { has_country_flag = is_china_flag has_country_flag = is_revolutionary_china_flag } }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_GURKANI_EMPIRE_STRING_ADJ_s_FR
		trigger = { OR = { has_country_flag = is_gurkani_flag has_country_flag = is_revolutionary_gurkani_flag } }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_HANSEATIC_LEAGUE_ADJ_s_FR
		trigger = { has_country_flag = is_hanseatic_league_flag }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_KINGDOM_OF_GOD_ADJ_ms_FR
		trigger = { has_country_flag = is_kingdom_of_god_flag }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_THE_CALIPHATE_ADJ_ms_FR
		trigger = { has_country_flag = unified_islam }
	}

		localisation_key = string_TURKEY_STRING_ADJ_ms_FR
		trigger = { OR = { has_country_flag = is_turkey_flag has_country_flag = is_revolutionary_turkey_flag } }
	}

### Ex: "[Austrian]" => "[autrichienne]" (singular feminine/féminin singulier)
defined_text = {
	name = GetFromAdjFS
	random = no
	### HIGHER PRIORITY ###
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_CHINA_STRING_ADJ_fs_FR
		trigger = { OR = { has_country_flag = is_china_flag has_country_flag = is_revolutionary_china_flag } }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_GURKANI_EMPIRE_STRING_ADJ_s_FR
		trigger = { OR = { has_country_flag = is_gurkani_flag has_country_flag = is_revolutionary_gurkani_flag } }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_HANSEATIC_LEAGUE_ADJ_s_FR
		trigger = { has_country_flag = is_hanseatic_league_flag }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_KINGDOM_OF_GOD_ADJ_fs_FR
		trigger = { has_country_flag = is_kingdom_of_god_flag }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_THE_CALIPHATE_ADJ_fs_FR
		trigger = { has_country_flag = unified_islam }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_TURKEY_STRING_ADJ_fs_FR
		trigger = { OR = { has_country_flag = is_turkey_flag has_country_flag = is_revolutionary_turkey_flag } }

### Ex: "[Austrian]" => "[autrichiens]" (plural masculine/masculin pluriel)

	random = no

		localisation_key = string_CHINA_STRING_ADJ_m_FR

	}

	name = GetFromAdjFP
	random = no
	### HIGHER PRIORITY ###
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_CHINA_STRING_ADJ_fp_FR
		trigger = { OR = { has_country_flag = is_china_flag has_country_flag = is_revolutionary_china_flag } }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_GURKANI_EMPIRE_STRING_ADJ_p_FR
		trigger = { OR = { has_country_flag = is_gurkani_flag has_country_flag = is_revolutionary_gurkani_flag } }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_HANSEATIC_LEAGUE_ADJ_p_FR

	}

### Ex: "[Austrian]" => "[autrichien]" (singular masculine/masculin singulier)
defined_text = {
	name = GetRootOwnerAdjMS
	random = no
	### HIGHER PRIORITY ###
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_CHINA_STRING_ADJ_m_FR
		trigger = { OR = { has_country_flag = is_china_flag has_country_flag = is_revolutionary_china_flag } }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_GURKANI_EMPIRE_STRING_ADJ_s_FR
		trigger = { OR = { has_country_flag = is_gurkani_flag has_country_flag = is_revolutionary_gurkani_flag } }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_HANSEATIC_LEAGUE_ADJ_s_FR
		trigger = { has_country_flag = is_hanseatic_league_flag }
	}

		trigger = { has_country_flag = is_kingdom_of_god_flag }
	}

		localisation_key = string_THE_CALIPHATE_ADJ_ms_FR
		trigger = { has_country_flag = unified_islam }
	}

	name = GetRootOwnerAdjMP
	random = no
	### HIGHER PRIORITY ###
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_CHINA_STRING_ADJ_m_FR
		trigger = { OR = { has_country_flag = is_china_flag has_country_flag = is_revolutionary_china_flag } }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_GURKANI_EMPIRE_STRING_ADJ_p_FR

	}

### Ex: "[Austrian]" => "[autrichiennes]" (plural feminine/féminin pluriel)

	name = GetRootOwnerAdjFP
	random = no
	### HIGHER PRIORITY ###
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_CHINA_STRING_ADJ_fp_FR
		trigger = { OR = { has_country_flag = is_china_flag has_country_flag = is_revolutionary_china_flag } }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_GURKANI_EMPIRE_STRING_ADJ_p_FR
		trigger = { OR = { has_country_flag = is_gurkani_flag has_country_flag = is_revolutionary_gurkani_flag } }
	}

	random = no

	name = GetRootOverlordAdjMP
	random = no
	### HIGHER PRIORITY ###
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_CHINA_STRING_ADJ_m_FR
		trigger = { OR = { has_country_flag = is_china_flag has_country_flag = is_revolutionary_china_flag } }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_GURKANI_EMPIRE_STRING_ADJ_p_FR

# Ex: "[Clergy]" => "les [clercs]" (lower case / minuscule)
defined_text = {
	name = GetClercs
	random = no
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_monasteries_FR
		trigger = {
			has_estate = estate_church
			OR = {
				religion = buddhism #Theravada
				religion = mahayana
				religion = vajrayana
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_babaylanes_FR
		trigger = {
			has_estate = estate_church
			tag = MAS
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_brahmins_FR
		trigger = {
			has_estate = estate_church
			religion = hinduism
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_gentry_FR
		trigger = {
			has_estate = estate_church
			OR = { has_reform = celestial_empire culture_group = east_asian }
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_ulema_FR
		trigger = {
			has_estate = estate_church
			OR = { religion_group = muslim religion_group = yazidi religion_group = muslirel } # La Pléiade
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_tlamacazqueh_FR
		trigger = {
			has_estate = estate_church
			religion = nahuatl
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_yangban_scholars_FR
		trigger = {
			has_estate = estate_church
			tag = KOR religion = confucianism
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_pastors_FR # La Pléiade
		trigger = {
			has_estate = estate_church
			OR = { religion = protestant religion = reformed }
			has_global_flag = la_pleiade # La Pléiade
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_popes_FR # La Pléiade
		trigger = {
			has_estate = estate_church
			AND = { religion = orthodox OR = { culture_group = east_slavic culture_group = south_slavic culture_group = west_slavic } } 
			has_global_flag = la_pleiade # La Pléiade
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_shamans_FR # La Pléiade
		trigger = {
			has_estate = estate_church
			religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
			has_global_flag = la_pleiade # La Pléiade
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_gurus_FR # La Pléiade
		trigger = {
			has_estate = estate_church
			religion = sikhism
			has_global_flag = la_pleiade # La Pléiade
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_medicine_men_FR # La Pléiade
		trigger = {
			has_estate = estate_church
			religion = totemism
			has_global_flag = la_pleiade # La Pléiade
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_godar_FR # La Pléiade
		trigger = {
			has_estate = estate_church
			religion = norse_pagan_reformed
			has_global_flag = la_pleiade # La Pléiade
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_rabbis_FR # La Pléiade
		trigger = {
			has_estate = estate_church
			religion_group = jewish_group
			has_global_flag = la_pleiade # La Pléiade
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_priests_FR # La Pléiade
		trigger = {
			has_estate = estate_church
			OR = { religion = hussite religion = confucianism religion = shinto religion = animism religion = shamanism religion = inti religion = mesoamerican_religion }
			has_global_flag = la_pleiade # La Pléiade
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_mobeds_FR # La Pléiade
		trigger = {
			has_estate = estate_church
			religion = zoroastrian
			has_global_flag = la_pleiade # La Pléiade
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_church_FR
		trigger = {
			has_estate = estate_church
		}
	}
}

# Ex: "[Nobility]" => "les [nobles]" (lower case / minuscule)
defined_text = {
	name = GetNobles
	random = no
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_beys_FR
		trigger = {
			has_estate = estate_nobles
			technology_group = ottoman
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_boyars_FR
		trigger = {
			has_estate = estate_nobles
			OR = { culture_group = east_slavic primary_culture = bulgarian primary_culture = romanian }
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_szlachta_FR
		trigger = {
			has_estate = estate_nobles
			OR = { primary_culture = polish primary_culture = lithuanian }
		}

		}

		}

			has_estate = estate_nobles

		}
	}

		trigger = {

		}

		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_junkers_FR
		trigger = {
			has_estate = estate_nobles
			OR = { has_reform = prussian_republic_reform has_reform = prussian_monarchy tag = GER }
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_warriors_FR # La Pléiade
		trigger = {
			has_estate = estate_nobles
			OR = { government = native has_reform = siberian_tribe has_reform = native_basic_reform }
			has_global_flag = la_pleiade # La Pléiade
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_nobles_FR
		trigger = {
			has_estate = estate_nobles
		}

# Ex: "The [Tribes]/[Cossacks]/[troops]" => "les [tribus]/[cosaques]/[troupes]" (lower case / minuscule)
defined_text = {
	name = GetTribusOuCosaquesN
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_nomadic_tribes_FR
		trigger = {
			has_estate = estate_nomadic_tribes
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_cossacks_FR
		trigger = {
			has_estate = estate_cossacks
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_troops_FR # Fallback
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_estate = estate_nomadic_tribes }
			NOT = { has_estate = estate_cossacks }
		}
	}
}
# Ex: "[They] want more loot (= the Tribes/Cossacks/troops)" => "[ils/elles] veulent davantage de butin (= les tribus/cosaques/troupes)" (lower case / minuscule)
defined_text = {
	name = GetTribusOuCosaquesIlsElles
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_elles_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_estate = estate_nomadic_tribes
				AND = {
					NOT = { has_estate = estate_nomadic_tribes }
					NOT = { has_estate = estate_cossacks }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_ils_FR
		trigger = {
			has_estate = estate_cossacks
		}
	}
}

}
# Ex: "[Jains]" => "les [jaïns]" (lower case / minuscule)
defined_text = {
	name = GetJains
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_jains_FR
		trigger = {
			has_estate = estate_jains
		}
	}
}

### Ex: "sell [the] wine/wool/gold/slaves" => "vendre [le] vin/[la] laine/[l']or/[les] esclaves" (lower case / minuscule)
defined_text = {
	name = GetLeLaBC
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_le_FR
		trigger = {
			frloc_trade_goods_masc_sg_cons = yes
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_la_FR
		trigger = {
			frloc_trade_goods_fem_sg_cons = yes
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_l_FR
		trigger = {
			frloc_trade_goods_sg_vow = yes
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_les_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				frloc_trade_goods_pl_cons = yes
				frloc_trade_goods_pl_vow = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
### Ex: "Wine/Wool/Gold/Slaves is/are sold" => "[Le] vin/[La] laine/[L']or/[Les] esclaves est/sont vendu(e)(s)" (upper case / majuscule)

			OR = {

				frloc_trade_goods_pl_vow = yes

			}
		}
	}

########################################
###   Manufactures // Manufactures   ###
########################################
#Copied from GetManufactory
#Prints the province's manufactory (if one is built)
###Ex: "The estates request the building of [a naval equipment manufactory] / [a trade station]." = "Les ordres demandent la construction d'[une manufacture navale] / d'[un comptoir commercial]." (= lower case/minuscule)
defined_text = {
	name = GetUnUneManufacture
	random = no
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_a_building_wharf_FR # manufacture navale
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				trade_goods = naval_supplies
				trade_goods = fish
				trade_goods = salt
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_a_building_weapons_FR # manufacture d'armes
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				trade_goods = copper
				trade_goods = iron
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_a_building_textile_FR # manufacture textile
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				trade_goods = wool
				trade_goods = cloth
				trade_goods = silk
				trade_goods = dyes
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_a_building_plantations_FR # plantation
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				trade_goods = coffee
				trade_goods = cotton
				trade_goods = sugar
				trade_goods = tobacco
				trade_goods = tea
				trade_goods = cocoa
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_a_building_tradecompany_FR # comptoir commercial
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				trade_goods = ivory
				trade_goods = slaves
				trade_goods = spices
				trade_goods = fur
				trade_goods = incense
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_a_building_farm_estate_FR # domaine foncier
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				trade_goods = grain
				trade_goods = livestock
				trade_goods = wine
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_a_building_mills_FR # moulin
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				trade_goods = paper
				trade_goods = gems
				trade_goods = tropical_wood
				trade_goods = glass
				trade_goods = chinaware
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_a_building_furnace_FR # fourneau
		trigger = {
			trade_goods = coal
		}
	}
}




##############################################################
###   State Forms // Désignations des régimes politiques   ###
##############################################################
#When you need to refer a government/state
#In the future incorporate more special things here
###Ex: "It is [the] Council/Crown of X." = "C'est [le] Conseil/[la] Couronne de X." (= lower case/minuscule)
defined_text = {
	name = GetLeLaLRegime
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_la_FR
		trigger = {
			government = monarchy
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_le_FR
		trigger = {
			government = republic
		}
	}
}
###Ex: "[The] Council/Crown of X" = "[Le] Conseil/[La] Couronne de X" (= upper case/majuscule)
defined_text = {
	name = GetLeLaLRegimeCap
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_la_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			government = monarchy
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_le_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			government = republic
		}
	}
}



###Ex: "The order came [from the] Council/Crown of X." = "L'ordre est venu [du] Conseil/[de la] Couronne de X." (= lower case/minuscule)
defined_text = {
	name = GetDuDelaRegime
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_dela_FR
		trigger = {
			government = monarchy
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_du_FR
		trigger = {
			government = republic
		}
	}
}

	name = GetDuDelaRegimeCap

		localisation_key = string_dela_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			government = monarchy
		}
	}

			government = republic
		}
	}

	name = GetAuAlaRegime
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_ala_FR
		trigger = {
			government = monarchy
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_au_FR
		trigger = {
			government = republic
		}
	}
}
###Ex: "[To the] Council/Crown of X came this order..." = "[Au] Conseil/[À la] Couronne de X est venu l'ordre de..." (= upper case/majuscule)
defined_text = {
	name = GetAuAlaRegimeCap
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_ala_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			government = monarchy
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_au_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			government = republic
		}
	}
}



### Ex: "[l'État]/[la République]/[Dieu]/[la horde]/[la tribu], c'est moi" => "[l'État]/[la République]/[Dieu]/[la horde]/[la tribu], c'est moi"
defined_text = {
	name = GetLeLaTypeRegime
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_letat_FR
		trigger = {
			government = monarchy
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_larepublique_FR
		trigger = {
			government = republic
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_Dieu_FR
		trigger = {
			government = theocracy
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_lahorde_FR
		trigger = {
			government = tribal
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_latribu_FR
		trigger = {
			government = native
		}
	}
}
### Ex: "[L'État]/[La République]/[Dieu]/[La horde]/[La tribu], c'est moi" => "[L'État]/[La République]/[Dieu]/[La horde]/[La tribu], c'est moi"
defined_text = {
	name = GetLeLaTypeRegimeCap
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_letat_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			government = monarchy
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_larepublique_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			government = republic
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_Dieu_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			government = theocracy
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_lahorde_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			government = tribal
		}
	}

			government = native
		}
	}

################################################################################################
###   Religious Schools Names & Adjectives / Noms et adjectifs pour les écoles religieuses   ###
################################################################################################
#Ex: "[Malikism] is one of the Muslim schools." => "Le [malékisme] est l'une des écoles de l'islam."
defined_text = {
	name = GetEcoleReligieuseN
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_hanafi_school_n_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				religious_school = { group = muslim school = hanafi_school }
				religious_school = { group = muslirel school = hanafi_school } # La Pléiade
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_hanbali_school_n_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				religious_school = { group = muslim school = hanbali_school }
				religious_school = { group = muslirel school = hanbali_school } # La Pléiade
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_ismaili_school_n_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				religious_school = { group = muslim school = ismaili_school }
				religious_school = { group = muslirel school = ismaili_school } # La Pléiade
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_jafari_school_n_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				religious_school = { group = muslim school = jafari_school }
				religious_school = { group = muslirel school = jafari_school } # La Pléiade
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_maliki_school_n_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				religious_school = { group = muslim school = maliki_school }
				religious_school = { group = muslirel school = maliki_school } # La Pléiade
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_shafii_school_n_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				religious_school = { group = muslim school = shafii_school }
				religious_school = { group = muslirel school = shafii_school } # La Pléiade
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_zaidi_school_n_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				religious_school = { group = muslim school = zaidi_school }
				religious_school = { group = muslirel school = zaidi_school } # La Pléiade
			}
		}
	}
}

	name = GetEcoleReligieuseAdjMP
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_hanafi_school_p_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				religious_school = { group = muslim school = hanafi_school }
				religious_school = { group = muslirel school = hanafi_school } # La Pléiade
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_hanbali_school_p_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				religious_school = { group = muslim school = hanbali_school }
				religious_school = { group = muslirel school = hanbali_school } # La Pléiade
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_ismaili_school_p_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				religious_school = { group = muslim school = ismaili_school }
				religious_school = { group = muslirel school = ismaili_school } # La Pléiade
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_jafari_school_p_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				religious_school = { group = muslim school = jafari_school }
				religious_school = { group = muslirel school = jafari_school } # La Pléiade
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_maliki_school_p_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				religious_school = { group = muslim school = maliki_school }
				religious_school = { group = muslirel school = maliki_school } # La Pléiade
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_shafii_school_p_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				religious_school = { group = muslim school = shafii_school }
				religious_school = { group = muslirel school = shafii_school } # La Pléiade
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_zaidi_school_p_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				religious_school = { group = muslim school = zaidi_school }
				religious_school = { group = muslirel school = zaidi_school } # La Pléiade
			}
		}
	}
}

### Ex: "A [Turkish] diplomatic advisor" => "une conseillère diplomatique [turque]" (singular feminine / féminin singulier)
defined_text = {
	name = GetDipCultFS
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_pommeranian_fs_FR
		trigger = { employed_advisor = { category = DIP culture = pommeranian } }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_prussian_fs_FR
		trigger = { employed_advisor = { category = DIP culture = prussian } }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_hannoverian_fs_FR
		trigger = { employed_advisor = { category = DIP culture = hannoverian } }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_hessian_fs_FR
		trigger = { employed_advisor = { category = DIP culture = hessian } }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_saxon_fs_FR
		trigger = { employed_advisor = { category = DIP culture = saxon } }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_franconian_fs_FR
		trigger = { employed_advisor = { category = DIP culture = franconian } }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_swabian_s_FR
		trigger = { employed_advisor = { category = DIP culture = swabian } }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_swiss_s_FR
		trigger = { employed_advisor = { category = DIP culture = swiss } }
