###########################################################################################################
###   Culture Adjectives for Military Advisors // Adjectifs culturels pour les conseillers militaires   ###
###########################################################################################################

### Ex: "A [Turkish] military advisor" => "un conseiller militaire [turc]" (singular masculine / masculin singulier)

	name = GetMilCultMS

####################################################################################
###   Culture Adjectives for Rulers // Adjectifs culturels pour les dirigeants   ###
####################################################################################

### Ex: "A [Turkish] ruler" => "un dirigeant [turc]" (singular masculine / masculin singulier)
defined_text = {
	name = GetDirCultMS
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_pommeranian_ms_FR
		trigger = { ruler_culture = pommeranian }
	}

####################################################################################
###   Culture Adjectives for Consorts // Adjectifs culturels pour les consorts   ###
####################################################################################

### Ex: "A [Turkish] consort" => "un consort [turc]" (singular masculine / masculin singulier)

######################################################################################################################
###   Religion Adjectives for Administrative Advisors // Adjectifs religieux pour les conseillers administratifs   ###
######################################################################################################################

### Ex: "A [Protestant] administrative advisor" => "un conseiller administratif [protestant]" (singular masculine / masculin singulier)

	name = GetAdmRelMS

###   Religion Adjectives for Diplomatic Advisors // Adjectifs religieux pour les conseillers diplomatiques   ###
#################################################################################################################

### Ex: "A [Protestant] diplomatic advisor" => "un conseiller diplomatique [protestant]" (singular masculine / masculin singulier)

	name = GetDipRelFS

### Ex: "[Protestant] diplomatic advisors are beautiful" => "les conseillères diplomatiques [protestantes] sont jolies" (plural feminine / féminin pluriel)
defined_text = {
	name = GetDipRelFP
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_anglican_fp_FR
		trigger = { employed_advisor = { category = DIP religion = anglican } }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_hussite_p_FR
		trigger = { employed_advisor = { category = DIP religion = hussite } }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_catholic_p_FR
		trigger = { employed_advisor = { category = DIP religion = catholic } }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_protestant_fp_FR
		trigger = { employed_advisor = { category = DIP religion = protestant } }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_reformed_fp_FR
		trigger = { employed_advisor = { category = DIP religion = reformed } }

############################################################################################################
###   Religion Adjectives for Military Advisors // Adjectifs religieux pour les conseillers militaires   ###
############################################################################################################

### Ex: "A [Protestant] military advisor" => "un conseiller militaire [protestant]" (singular masculine / masculin singulier)

#####################################################################################
###   Religion Adjectives for Rulers // Adjectifs religieux pour les dirigeants   ###
#####################################################################################

### Ex: "A [Protestant] ruler" => "un dirigeant [protestant]" (singular masculine / masculin singulier)
defined_text = {
	name = GetDirRelMS
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_anglican_ms_FR
		trigger = { ruler_religion = anglican } 
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_hussite_s_FR
		trigger = { ruler_religion = hussite } 
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_catholic_s_FR
		trigger = { ruler_religion = catholic } 
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_protestant_ms_FR
		trigger = { ruler_religion = protestant }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_reformed_ms_FR
		trigger = { ruler_religion = reformed }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_orthodox_s_FR
		trigger = { ruler_religion = orthodox }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_coptic_s_FR
		trigger = { ruler_religion = coptic }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_sunni_s_FR
		trigger = { ruler_religion = sunni }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_shiite_s_FR
		trigger = { ruler_religion = shiite }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_ibadi_s_FR
		trigger = { ruler_religion = ibadi }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_buddhism_FR
		trigger = { ruler_religion = buddhism }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_vajrayana_FR
		trigger = { ruler_religion = vajrayana }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_mahayana_FR
		trigger = { ruler_religion = mahayana }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_confucianism_s_FR
		trigger = { ruler_religion = confucianism }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_shinto_FR
		trigger = { ruler_religion = shinto }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_hinduism_ms_FR
		trigger = { ruler_religion = hinduism }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_sikhism_ms_FR
		trigger = { ruler_religion = sikhism }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_animism_s_FR
		trigger = { ruler_religion = animism }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_shamanism_s_FR
		trigger = { ruler_religion = shamanism }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_totemism_s_FR
		trigger = { ruler_religion = totemism }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_inti_s_FR
		trigger = { ruler_religion = inti }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_nahuatl_s_FR

#####################################################################################
###   Religion Adjectives for Consorts // Adjectifs religieux pour les consorts   ###
#####################################################################################

### Ex: "A [Protestant] consort" => "un consort [protestant]" (singular masculine / masculin singulier)
defined_text = {
	name = GetConsRelMS
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_anglican_ms_FR
		trigger = { consort_religion = anglican }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_hussite_s_FR
		trigger = { consort_religion = hussite }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_catholic_s_FR
		trigger = { consort_religion = catholic }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_protestant_ms_FR
		trigger = { consort_religion = protestant }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_reformed_ms_FR
		trigger = { consort_religion = reformed }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_orthodox_s_FR
		trigger = { consort_religion = orthodox }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_coptic_s_FR
		trigger = { consort_religion = coptic }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_sunni_s_FR
		trigger = { consort_religion = sunni }

### Ex: "[Protestant] consorts" => "les consorts [protestants]" (plural masculine / masculin pluriel)
defined_text = {
	name = GetConsRelMP
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_anglican_mp_FR
		trigger = { consort_religion = anglican }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_hussite_p_FR
		trigger = { consort_religion = hussite }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_catholic_p_FR
		trigger = { consort_religion = catholic }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_protestant_mp_FR
		trigger = { consort_religion = protestant }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_reformed_mp_FR
		trigger = { consort_religion = reformed }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_orthodox_p_FR
		trigger = { consort_religion = orthodox }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_coptic_p_FR
		trigger = { consort_religion = coptic }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_sunni_p_FR
		trigger = { consort_religion = sunni }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_shiite_p_FR
		trigger = { consort_religion = shiite }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_ibadi_p_FR
		trigger = { consort_religion = ibadi }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_buddhism_FR
		trigger = { consort_religion = buddhism }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_vajrayana_FR
		trigger = { consort_religion = vajrayana }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_mahayana_FR
		trigger = { consort_religion = mahayana }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_confucianism_p_FR
		trigger = { consort_religion = confucianism }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_shinto_FR
		trigger = { consort_religion = shinto }
	}

		localisation_key = string_hinduism_mp_FR
		trigger = { consort_religion = hinduism }
	}

		localisation_key = string_sikhism_mp_FR
		trigger = { consort_religion = sikhism }

###################################################################################
###   Religion Adjectives for Heirs // Adjectifs religieux pour les héritiers   ###
###################################################################################

### Ex: "A [Protestant] heir" => "un héritier [protestant]" (singular masculine / masculin singulier)
defined_text = {
	name = GetHrtRelMS
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_anglican_ms_FR
		trigger = { heir_religion = anglican }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_hussite_s_FR
		trigger = { heir_religion = hussite }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_catholic_s_FR
		trigger = { heir_religion = catholic }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_protestant_ms_FR
		trigger = { heir_religion = protestant }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_reformed_ms_FR
		trigger = { heir_religion = reformed }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_orthodox_s_FR
		trigger = { heir_religion = orthodox }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_coptic_s_FR
		trigger = { heir_religion = coptic }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_sunni_s_FR
		trigger = { heir_religion = sunni }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_shiite_s_FR
		trigger = { heir_religion = shiite }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_ibadi_s_FR
		trigger = { heir_religion = ibadi }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_buddhism_FR
		trigger = { heir_religion = buddhism }
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_vajrayana_FR
		trigger = { heir_religion = vajrayana }
	}

###########################################################################
###   Event Advisors (works out which via flag) // Conseillers (tous)   ###
###########################################################################

########Event advisors (uses flags to see which one is relevant and uses that to refer to the relevant custom loc listed above in the advisors section)

# Ex: "So [he/she] tried" => "Aussi a-t-[il/elle] tenté de" (lower case / minuscule)
defined_text = {
	name = GetIlElleEvent
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_GetIlElleAdm
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = advisor_events_adm
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_GetIlElleDip
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = advisor_events_dip
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_GetIlElleMil
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = advisor_events_mil
		}
	}
}
# Ex: "[He/She] tried" => "[Il/Elle] a tenté de" (upper case / majuscule)
defined_text = {
	name = GetIlElleEventCap
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_GetIlElleAdmCap
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = advisor_events_adm
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_GetIlElleDipCap
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = advisor_events_dip
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_GetIlElleMilCap
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = advisor_events_mil
		}
	}
}


# Ex: "As for [him/her]" => "Quant à [lui/elle]" (lower case / minuscule)
defined_text = {
	name = GetLuiElleEvent
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_GetLuiElleAdm
		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = advisor_events_adm
		}
	}

		}
	}
	text = {

		trigger = {
			has_country_flag = advisor_events_mil
		}
	}

##########################################
###   Limited Uses // Usages limités   ###
##########################################

# Copied from GetLegitimacyOrMeritocracy
# Ex: "Restore legitimacy/meritocracy" => "Restaurer la [légitimité/méritocratie]" (lower case / minuscule)
defined_text = {
	name = GetLegitimacyOrMeritocracyFR
	random = no
	
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_meritocracy_FR
		trigger = {
			has_reform = celestial_empire
			has_dlc = "Mandate of Heaven"
		}
	}
	
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_legitimacy_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				NOT = { has_reform = celestial_empire }
				NOT = { has_dlc = "Mandate of Heaven" }
			}
		}
	}
}



#####################################
###   Parliaments // Parlements   ###
#####################################
# Ex: "Convoke [the] Parliament." => "Convoquer [le] Grand conseil / [l']Alting / [la] Douma / [l']Assemblée nationale / [les] Cortes." (lower case / minuscule)
defined_text = {
	name = GetLeLaParlement
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_le_FR
		trigger = {
			frloc_parliament_masc_sg_cons = yes
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_la_FR
		trigger = {
			frloc_parliament_fem_sg_cons = yes
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_l_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				frloc_parliament_masc_sg_vow = yes
				frloc_parliament_fem_sg_vow = yes
			}
		}
	}
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_les_FR
		trigger = {
			frloc_parliament_masc_pl = yes
		}
	}
}
# Ex: "[The] Parliament refused." => "[Le] Grand conseil / [L' ]Alting / [La] Douma / [L']Assemblée / [Les] Cortes a/ont refusé." (upper case / majuscule)

	name = GetLeLaParlementCap
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_le_cap_FR
		trigger = {
			frloc_parliament_masc_sg_cons = yes
		}

defined_text = {
	name = GetEEntParlement
	text = {
		localisation_key = string_e_FR
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				frloc_parliament_masc_sg_cons = yes
				frloc_parliament_fem_sg_cons = yes
				frloc_parliament_masc_sg_vow = yes
				frloc_parliament_fem_sg_vow = yes
			}
		}
	}

		localisation_key = string_ent_FR
		trigger = {
			frloc_parliament_masc_pl = yes
		}
	}
